developerResponse.body:
Thanks Vinnie for such a detailed feedback!
We'll work on it and will make sure that these are sorted.
Do mail us at reviews@mojapp.in in case you have more feedback
Ankur

review:
1. I have zero notifications even when a few have liked my video. I have no ways to find who liked it.

2. Videos do pause automatically after spending sometime surfing through videos in video feed.

3. When we go to a creator's page, open a video and then scroll to move to next, videos don't get aligned properly on screen. 

4. Provide an option to become a beta tester through app.

5. "Comments" option was not really needed. I liked it's absence. But would love to see a "dislike" button.

6. Day mode and dark mode both should be there. My iPhone is set to turn to one of these modes depending upon sunrise and sunset. Would be great if your app follows it too.

6. Last but not the least, I hope you have a control and plans to avoid spreading cringe content. Also focus on not spreading only big creator's videos who were famous on Tik Tok. People didn't really like them.
title: Points to focus

review:
Actually very happy that our Indians have developed such an app,, Appreciation for the great work. But yeah!!!  Please do look into the matter below. Which makes it so inefficient. After all I really appreciate the initiative for the development of this app.

1)I’m not able to see the notifications on my profile nor the likes are getting displayed there

2) When we are looking at the newsfeed theres a problem in that, and it feels so inefficient in which we are unable to check who liked our videos or who shared it. 

3) The page doesn’t get refresh when there’s a problem raises 

4) Its response is very slow and late.
title: Great initiative a bit inefficient

developerResponse.body:
Hi

We are working on your feedbacks

Thanks you

review:
It’s a great start by our indian company but to meet international expectation lots of work to be done on this app.

We don’t get any notification if any one likes the video or follows you. You can’t come to know who is following you and who has liked your videos. Also there are many small small things need to be done. I expect moj team to looks into this and makes changes. Wanted to see our indian app grow like any other apps.
title: Lots of work to be done to make it entertaining

review:
It seems like it is tiktok only, people are posting so much hate and there are so many har rasmen to and bully videos here, I have reported many but no action is being taken, those are still there, just pure cringe, hate speech, bully, discrimination and what not,
I seriously thought for once that it would be better but no, it is even worst than tiktok,
Absolute no standards, just to get fame people are posting absolute garbage, and they are ridiculing LGBTQIA+ community and so many more and yet you are doing nothing, I think just remove the option of report if you are not doing anything when we report.

I have experienced a problem with the UX.

1. The Clear search history "x" button has a very small trigger area. I always miss 99% of the time, and it would instead take me to a user profile. Please make it like a full size button with a border or just Put a delete button. Please include in the upcoming update.

Thank you for your efforts in making this App.

title: My videos

review:
Bugs: 

Language label issue: under “choose language”, I could see that both Bengali and Haryanvi have Bangla written under English names. Silly mistake.
Snapchat lens icons are missing sometimes, lens such as flawless, slinky, get funky are having no icon at all. 
Suggestions which I like to use: 

I am a software employee and I have few suggestions to make.

May be you can allow verified users to test your product at regular intervals, to improve user experience. With providing certain incentives to testers. 
Provide an option to go to “original sound” owner profile when clicked on the name “original sound by xyz”
Provide an option to chose multiple language options when creating profile.
Please allow user to upload readymade videos.
As an iPhone user, I save images and videos in iCloud or some other cloud storage before uploading into Moj, due to less internal memory. Please allow user to upload through different popular means, such as Apple files, google drive, jio cloud e.t.c.,
Allow us to follow and “unfollow along with warning message” if follower really wants to unfollow “at the profile icon itself”. Currently we have to open profile to unfollow, which I feel is unnecessary step. 
Please integrate multiple popular apps, such as signal and telegram. Because Some of us don’t really like Whatsapp.
Would appreciate if more gender options were there. And allow us to chose non-binary pronouns. Such as they/them instead of her/him 
May be you can allow users to have multiple accounts and an option to switch between/among those accounts.

Final suggestion: 

Why don’t you guys come up with a competitor for whatsapp/signal/ telegram. This is the right time to do that. 

Thanks 

Tejas

review:
m a 14 year old boy from kerela but dont consider this to be stupid 
all though u guys have come a long way after the ban of a prominent platform tiktok and because u guys have introduced this in a signififcant time period very essential for “ur” growth
The measures May or may not be taken

1)One way login :- From all devices facilitate one way login ,so that ur System is not jeoperdised 

2)adjust homeing screen :-Make rearangements in the screen for eg : make the profile name visble with videos and the certain edits are also having bugs and impractices

3)monetize ur app :-start paying big ,ie get urself a criteria which provides money for large follow holders:-this would not only attract people but also give u good ratings and would also increase the aspirations of the people

4)keep a Panel/botpot/or any ballot device thing which facilitates the needs and views and measures demanded by the people

5)Also even though i dont have a say in this :- try to make ur app symbol more attractive and unique 

6)Introduce new pattern of showing videos :-like that of the youtubes way of showing trending and coming up videos 

7)write back to prominent or emerging MOJers to make them feel more closer to urself 

8)Decrease advertising focusing on increasing internal features this would give u more publicity than forced advertisement in youtube and other areas

9)increase stricter copyright claims and no re record policy which encourages people to post only their videos which inturn increases the diversity with the videos

10) Have a Fixed understandable Quote with u moj app like for eg: Good food ,Good mood or etx rather than Moj karo etc...it makes us feel like it just want people and not a fun based app 

Anyway Gtg love mojing🤗 my moj username is Sanan marakkar
or try @positivevibesonly🙃
title: Implement Certain necessary features

title: Hii Sir

review:
After repeated attempts i find it absolutely impossible to login to my account! i used my mobile number for logging in to my account initially, then one day all of a sudden the app treated me like a first timer and started asking login or signup options. The more pathetic situation is that i am not able to login to ny existing account or evencreate a new one . 
The steps shown below is a step by step description aboutthe occurence of errors . I would like to explain the process to you clearly so read accordingly 
1. Opened app from the home page
2. Me clicking the man head on the far right bottom corner of the app to see my account 
3. Here the app displays login options like : login/signup at the top and login options like Facebook email and mobile number below it 
4. Me , trying to login to my account using all the three options and none of them really working 
5. From the very moment i enter my phone number, i will get an otp . After entering otp on time within a snap of 1sec same login options appear again ! 
6. The most sad thing is that none of the login options is working and interestingly i can still find my account through search button ! 
7. I was new to the app and i liked it at the beginning very much and i also posted like 4 or 5 videos within two days , from the third day onwards i was not able to post ang videos at all

So please do something to rectify this error. I am sure that many of them are also facing same situation as it is evident from the new youtube videos with the title MOJ APP NOT WORKING!?
title: Not able to login to my account
